customer_name: 2 Crow Security Solutions, L L C
site_name: 2 Crow Security Solutions, L L C

citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on03-JAN-17 at 12:20 pm .
Veterinary Medical Officer attempted to locate the physical address of the facility but was unable to find the facility.
The inspector called the contact number provided by facility and left a voice message at 12:20pm. A text message
was received by the inspector from the phone number provided stating that the business had been dissolved. The
inspector waited in the area for thirty minutes before leaving.

narrative:
2.38(b)                    REPEAT
MISCELLANEOUS.
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on03-JAN-17 at 12:20 pm .
Veterinary Medical Officer attempted to locate the physical address of the facility but was unable to find the facility.
The inspector called the contact number provided by facility and left a voice message at 12:20pm. A text message
was received by the inspector from the phone number provided stating that the business had been dissolved. The
inspector waited in the area for thirty minutes before leaving.
